message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, Bob.  I get slightly more since I proposed first.
Let's flip the script! I propose a similar split, just with me getting a little more this time. We can both be happy with this, no need to go any further.
Bob, it's clear we both want to be fair. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth and split this right down the middle.  We'll both lose money if this drags on.
